nodes.text: Mootai was a male Moorjhoni who lived on the planet Moorjhone in 20 BBY. When his brother Mas tripped when preparing to attack Ja'Boag's mine, Mootai stopped to help him up. Maul scolded him for doing so, and later during their preparations Maul used the Force to trip Mootai, and was happy to see Mas leave him behind.
